juzs.text: 67|1|shubh hai vah allaah, jisake haath mein raajy hai tatha jo kuchh vah chaahe, kar sakata hai.
67|2|jisane utpann kiya hai mrtyu tatha jeevan ko, taaki tumhaaree pareeksha le ki tumamen kisaka karm adhik achchha hai? tatha vah prabhutvashaalee, ati kshamaavaan hai.
67|3|jisane utpann kiye saat aakaash, oopar tale. to kya tum dekhate ho atyant krpaasheel kee utpatti mein koee asangati? phir punah dekho, kya tum dekhate ho koee daraad
67|4|phir baar-baar dekho, vaapas aayegee tumhaaree or nigaah thak-haar kar.

67|5|aur hamane sajaaya hai sansaar ke aakaash ko pradeepon (grahon) se tatha banaaya hai unhen (taaron ko) maar bhagaane ka saadhan shaitaanon[1] ko, aur taiyaar kee hai hamane unake lie dahakatee agni kee yaatana.
67|6|aur jinhonne kufr kiya apane paalanahaar ke saath to unake lie narak kee yaatana hai. aur vah bura sthaan hai.
67|7|jab vah phenke jaayenge usamen to sunenge usakee dahaad aur vah khaul rahee hogee.

67|8|prateet hoga ki phat padegee rosh (krodh) ser, jab-jab phenka jaayega usamen koee samooh to prashn karenge unase usake prahareeh kya nahin aaya tumhaare paas koee saavadhaan karane vaala (rasool)
67|9|vah kahengeh haan hamaare paas aaya saavadhaan karane vaala. par hamane jhuthala diya aur kaha ki nahin utaara hai allaah ne kuchh. tum hee bade kupath mein ho.
67|10|tatha vah kahengeh yadi hamane suna aur samajha hota to narak ke vaasiyon mein na hote.
67|11|aise vah sveekaar kar lenge apane paapon ko. to dooree[1] hai narak vaasiyon ke lie.
67|12|nihsandeh jo darate hon apane paalanahaar se bin dekhe unheen ke lie kshama hai tatha bada pratiphal hai.
67|13|tum chupake bolo apanee baat athava oonche svar mein. vaastav mein vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai seenon ke bhedon ko.
67|14|kya vah nahin jaanega jis ne utnn kiya? aur vah sookshmadarshak[1] sarv soochit hai

67|15|vahee hai jis ne banaaya hai tumhaare lie dharatee ko vashvartee, to chalo-phiro usake kshetron mein tatha khao usakee pradaan kee huee jeevika. aur usee kee or tumhen phir jeevit ho kar jaana hai.
67|16|kya tum nirbhay ho gaye ho usase jo aakaash mein hai ki vah dhansa de dharatee mein phir vah achaanak kaanpane lage.
67|17|athava nirbhay ho gaye usase jo aakaash mein hai ki vah bhej de tum par pathareelee vaayu to tumhen gyaan ho jaayega ki kaisa raha mera saavadhaan karana
67|18|jhuthala chuke hain in[1] se poorv ke log to kaisee rahee meree pakad
67|19|kya unhonne nahin dekha pakshiyon kee or apane oopar pankh phailaate tatha sikodate. un ko atyant krpaasheel hee thaamata hai. nisandeh vah pratyek vastu ko dekh raha hai.
67|20|kaun hai vah tumhaaree sena jo tumhaaree sahaayata kar sakegee allaah ke muqaabale mein? balki vah ghus gaye hain avaigya tatha ghrna mein।
67|21|ya kaun hai jo tumhen jeevika pradaan kar sake, yadi rok le vah apanee jeevika? balki ve ghus gaye hain avaigya tatha ghrna mein.
67|22|to kya jo chal raha ho aundha ho kar apane munh ke bal vah adhik maargadarshan par hai ye jo seedha ho kar chal raha ho seedhee raah par
67|23|he nabee! aap kah den ki vahee hai jis ne paida kiya hai tumhen aur banaaye hain tumhaare kaan tatha aankh aur dil. bahut hee kam aabhaaree (krtagy) hote ho.
67|24|aap kah deh useene phailaaya hai tumhen dharatee mein aur usee kee or ekatrit[1] kiye jaoge.
67|25|tatha vah kahate hain ki ye vachan kab poora hoga yadi tum sachche ho
67|26|aap kah deh us ka gyaan bas allaah hee ko hai. aur main keval khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon.
67|27|phir jab vah dekhenge use sameep, to bigad jaayenge unake chehare jo kaafir ho gaye. tatha kaha jaayegaah ye vahee hai jisakee tum maang kar rahe the.
67|28|aap kah deh dekho yadi allaah naash kar de mujh ko tatha mere saathiyon ko athava daya kare ham par, to (batao ki) kaun hai jo sharan dega kaafiron ko duhkhadaayee[1] yaatana se
67|29|aap kah deh vah atyant krpaasheel hai. ham usapar eemaan laaye tatha useepar bharosa kiya, to tumhen gyaan ho jaayega ki kaun khule kupath mein hai.
67|30|aap kah deh bhala dekho yadi tumhaara paanee gaharaee mein chala jaaye, to kaun hai jo tumhen la kar dega bahata hua jal
68|1|noon aur shapath hai lekhanee (qalam) kee tatha usakee[1] jise vo likhate hain.
68|2|nahin hai aap, apane paalanahaar ke anugrah se paagal.
68|3|tatha nishchay pratiphal (badala) hai aapake lie anant.
68|4|tatha nishchay hee aap bade susheel hain.
68|5|to sheeghr aap dekh lenge tatha ve (kaafir bhee) dekh lenge.
68|6|ki paagal kaun hai.
68|7|vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee adhik jaanata hai use, jo kupath ho gaya usakee raah se aur vahee adhik jaanata hai unhen, jo seedhee raah par hain.
68|8|to aap baat na maanen jhuthalaane vaalon kee.
68|9|ve chaahate hain ki aap dheele ho jaayen, to ve bhee dheele ho[1] jaayen.
68|10|aur baat na maanen[1] aap kisee adhik shapath lene vaale, heen vyakti kee.
68|11|jo vyang karane vaala, chugaliyaan khaata phirata hai.
68|12|bhalaee se rokane vaala, atyaachaaree, bada paapee hai.
68|13|ghamandee hai aur isake pashchaat kuvansh (varn sankar) hai.
68|14|isalie ki vah dhan tatha putron vaala hai.
68|15|jab padhee jaatee hai usapar hamaaree aayaten, to kahata haih ye poorvajon kee kalpit kathaayen hain.
68|16|sheeghr hee ham daag laga denge usake soond[1] par.
68|17|nihsandeh, hamane unhen pareeksha mein daala[1] hai, jis prakaar baag vaalon ko pareeksha mein daala tha. jab unhonne shapath lee ki avashy tod lenge usake phal bhor hote hee.
68|18|aur in sha allaah (yadi allaah ne chaaha) nahin kaha.
68|19|to phir gaya us baag par ek kuchakr, aapake paalanahaar kee or se aur ve soye hue the.
68|20|to vah ho gaya jaise ujaad khetee ho.
68|21|ab ve ek-doosare ko pukaarane lage bhor hote heeh
68|22|ki tadake chalo apanee khetee par, yadi phal todane hain.
68|23|phir ve chal diye aapas mein chupake-chupake baaten karate hue.
68|24|ki kadaapi na aane paaye us (baag) ke bheetar aaj tumhaare paas koee nirdhan.
68|25|aur praatah hee pahunch gaye ki ve phal tod sakenge.
68|26|phir jab use dekha to kahaah nishchay ham raah bhool gaye.
68|27|balki ham vanchit ho[1] gaye.
68|28|to unamen se bichale bhaee ne kahaah kya mainne tumase nahin kaha tha ki tum (allaah kee) pavitrata ka varnan kyon nahin karate
68|29|ve kahane lageh pavitr hai hamaara paalanahaar! vaastav mein, ham hee atyaachaaree the.
68|30|phir sammukh ho gaye, ek-doosare kee ninda karate hue.
68|31|kahane lageh haay afsos! ham hee vidrohee the.
68|32|sambhav hai hamaara paalanahaar hamen badale mein pradaan kare isase uttam (baag). ham apane paalanahaar hee kee or roochi rakhate hain.
68|33|aise hee yaatana hotee hai aur aakhirat (paralok) kee yaatana isase bhee badee hai. kaash ve jaanate
68|34|nihsandeh, sadaachaariyon ke lie unake paalanahaar ke paas sukhon vaale svarg hain.
68|35|kya ham aagyaakaariyon[1] ko paapiyon ke samaan kar denge
68|36|tumhen kya ho gaya hai? tum kaisa nirnay kar rahe ho
68|37|kya tumhaare paas koee pustak hai, jisamen tum padhate ho
68|38|ki tumhen vahee milega, jo tum chaahoge
68|39|ya tumane hamase shapathen le rakhee hain, jo pralay tak chalee jaayengee ki tumhen vahee milega jisaka tum nirnay karoge
68|40|aap unase poochhiye ki unamen kaun isakee zamaanat leta hai
68|41|kya unake kuchh saajhee hain? phir to ve apane saajhiyon ko laayen,[1] yadi ve sachche hain.
68|42|jis din pindalee khol dee jaayegee aur vah bulaaye jaayenge sajda karane ke lie, to (sajda) nahin kar sakenge.
68|43|unakee aankhen jhukee hongee aur unapar apamaan chhaaya hoga. ve (sansaar mein) sajda karane ke lie bulaaye jaate rahe jabaki ve svasth the.
68|44|atah, aap chhod den mujhe tatha unhen, jo jhuthala rahe hain is baat (quraan) ko, ham unhen dheere-dheere kheench laayenge,[1] is prakaar ki unhen gyaan bhee nahin hoga.
68|45|tatha ham unhen avasar de rahe hain.[1] vastutah, hamaara upaay sudrdh hai.
68|46|to kya aap maang kar rahe hain kisee paarishramik[1] kee, to ve bojh se dabe ja rahe hain.
68|47|ya unake paas gaib ka gyaan hai, jise ve likh[1] rahe hain
68|48|to aap dhairy rakhen apane paalanahaar ke nirnay tak aur na ho jaayen machhalee vaale ke samaan.[1] jab usane pukaara aur vah shokapoorn tha.
68|49|aur yadi na pa letee use usake paalanahaar kee daya, to vah phenk diya jaata banjar mein aur vah buree dasha mein hota.
68|50|phir chun liya use usake paalanahaar ne aur bana diya use sadaachaariyon mein se.
68|51|aur aisa lagata hai ki jo kaafipar ho gaye, ve avashy phisala denge aapako apanee aankhon se (ghoor kar) jab ve sunate hon quraan ko tatha kahate hain ki vah avashay paagal hai.
68|52|jabaki ye quraan to bas ek[1] shiksha hai, poore sansaar vaasiyon ke lie.
69|1|jisaka hona sach hai.
69|2|vah kya hai, jisaka hona sach hai
69|3|tatha aap kya jaanen ki kya hai, jisaka hona sach hai
69|4|jhuthalaaya samood tatha aad (jaati) ne achaanak aa padane vaalee (pralay) ko.
69|5|phir samood, to ve dhvast kar diye gaye ati kadee dhvani se.
69|6|tatha aad, to ve dhvast kar diye gaye ek tez sheetal aandhee se.
69|7|lagaaye rakha use unapar saat raaten aur aath din nirantar, to aap dekhate ki ve jaati usamen aise pachhaadee huee hai, jaise khajoor ke khokhale tane.
69|8|to kya aap dekhate hain ki unamen koee shesh rah gaya hai
69|9|aur kiya yahee paap firaun ne aur jo usake poorv the tatha jinakee bastiyaan aundhee kar dee gayeen.
69|10|unhonne nahin maana apane paalanahaar ke rasool ko. antatah, usane pakad liya unhen, kadee pakad.
69|11|hamane, jab seema paar kar gaya jal, to tumhen savaar kar diya naav[1] mein.
69|12|taaki ham bana den use tumhaare lie ek shikshaaprad yaadagaar aur taaki surakshit rakh len ise sunane vaale kaan.
69|13|phir jab phoonk dee jaayegee soor (narasingha) mein ek phoonk.
69|14|aur uthaaya jaayega dharatee tatha parvaton ko, to donon choor-choor kar diye jaayenge[1] ek hee baar mein.
69|15|to usee din honee ho jaayegee.
69|16|tatha phat jaayega aakaash, to vah us din ksheen nirbal ho jaayega.
69|17|aur farishte usake kinaaron par honge tatha uthaaye honge aapake paalanahaar ke arsh (sinhaasan) ko apane oopar us din, aath farishte.
69|18|us din tum allaah ke paas upasthit kiye jaoge, nahin chhupa rah jaayega tumamen se koee.
69|19|phir jise diya jaayega usaka karmapatr daayen haath mein, vah kahegaah ye lo mera karmapatr padho.
69|20|mujhe vishvaas tha ki main milane vaala hoon apane haisaab se.
69|21|to vah apane man chaahe sukh mein hoga.
69|22|uchch shrenee ke svarg mein.
69|23|jisake phalon ke guchchhe jhuk rahe honge.
69|24|(unase kaha jaayegaah) khao tatha piyo aanand lekar usake badale, jo tumane kiya hai vigat dinon (sansaar) mein.
69|25|aur jise diya jaayega usaka karmapatr usake baayen haath mein, to vah kahegaah haay! mujhe mera karmapatr diya hee na jaata
69|26|tatha main na jaanata ki kya hai mera haisaab
69|27|kaash meree maut hee nirnaayak[1] hotee
69|28|nahin kaam aaya mera dhan.
69|29|mujhase samaapt ho gaya, mera prabhutv.
69|30|(aadesh hoga ki) use pakado aur usake gale mein tauq daal do.
69|31|phir narak mein use jhonk do.
69|32|phir use ek janjeer jisakee lambaee sattar gaz hai, mein jakad do.
69|33|vah eemaan nahin rakhata tha mahimaashaalee allaah par.
69|34|aur na prerana deta tha daridr ko bhojan karaane kee.
69|35|atah, nahin hai usaka aaj yahaan koee mitr.
69|36|aur na koee bhojan, peep ke siva.
69|37|jise paapee hee khaayenge.
69|38|to main shapath leta hoon usakee, jo tum dekhate ho.
69|39|tatha jo tum nahin dekhate ho.
69|40|nihsandeh, ye (quraan) aadaraneey rasool ka kathan[1] hai.
69|41|aur vah kisee kavi ka kathan nahin hai. tum log kam hee vishvaas karate ho.
69|42|aur na vah kisee jyotishee ka kathan hai, tum kam kee shiksha grahan karate ho.
69|43|sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka utaara hua hai.
69|44|aur yadi isane (nabee ne) hamapar koee baat banaee[1] hotee.
69|45|to avashy ham pakad lete usaka seedha haath.
69|46|phir avashy kaat dete usake gale kee rag.
69|47|phir tumamen se koee (mujhe) usase rokane vaala na hota.
69|48|nihsandeh, ye ek shiksha hai sadaachaariyon ke lie.
69|49|tatha vaastav mein ham jaanate hain ki tumamen kuchh jhuthalaane vaale hain.
69|50|aur nishchay ye pachhataave ka kaaran hoga kaafiron[1] ke lie.
69|51|vastutah, ye vishvasaneey saty hai.
69|52|atah, aap pavitrata ka varnan karen apane mahimaavaan paalanahaar ke naam kee.
70|1|prashn kiya ek prashn karane[1] vaale ne us yaatana ke baare mein, jo aane vaalee hai.
70|2|kaafiron par. nahin hai jise koee door karane vaala.
70|3|allaah oonchaeeyon vaale kee or se.
70|4|chadhate hain farishte tatha rooh[1] jisakee or, ek din mein, jisaka maap pachaas hazaar varsh hai.
70|5|atah, (he nabee!) aap sahan[1] karen achchhe prakaar se.
70|6|ve samajhate hain use door.
70|7|aur ham dekh rahe hain use sameep.
70|8|jis din ho jaayega aakaash pighalee huee dhaatu ke samaan.
70|9|tatha ho jaayenge parvat, rangaarang dhune hue oon ke samaan.
70|10|aur nahin poochhega koee mitr kisee mitr ko.
70|11|(jabaki) ve unhen dikhaaye jaayenge. kaamana karega paapee ki dand ke roop mein de de, us din kee yaatana ke, apane putron ko.
70|12|tatha apanee patnee aur apane bhaee ko.
70|13|tatha apane sameepavartee parivaar ko, jo use sharan deta tha.
70|14|aur jo dharatee mein hai, sabhee[1] ko, phir vah use yaatana se bacha le.
70|15|kadaapi (aisa) nahin (hoga).
70|16|vah agni kee jvaala hogee.
70|17|khaal udhedane vaalee.
70|18|vah pukaaregee use, jisane peechha dikhaaya[1] tatha munh phera.
70|19|tatha (dhan) ekatr kiya, phir saunt kar rakha.
70|20|vaastav mein, manushy atyant kachche dil ka paida kiya gaya hai.
70|21|jab use pahunchata hai duhkh, to udvign ho jaata hai.
70|22|aur jab use dhan milata hai, to kanjoosee karane lagata hai.
70|23|parantu, jo namaazee hain.
70|24|jo anapee namaaz ka sada paalan[1] karate hain.
70|25|aur jinake dhanon mein nishchit bhaag hai, yaachak (maangane vaala) tatha vanchit[1] ka.
70|26|tatha jo saty maanate hain pratikaar (pralay) ke din ko.
70|27|tatha jo apane paalanahaar kee yaatana se darate hain.
70|28|vaastav mein, aapake paalanahaar kee yaatana nirbhay rahane yogy nahin hai.
70|29|tatha jo apane guptaangon kee raksha karane vaale hain.
70|30|sivaay apanee patniyon aur apane svaamitv mein aaye daasiyon[1] ke, to vahee nindit nahin hain.
70|31|aur jo chaahe isake atirikt, to vahee seema ka ullanghan karane vaale hain.
70|32|aur jo apanee amaanaton tatha apane vachan ka paalan karate hain.
70|33|aur jo apane saakshyon (gavaahiyon) par sthit rahane vaale hain.
70|34|tatha jo apanee namaazon kee raksha karate hain.
70|35|vahee svargon mein sammaanit honge.
70|36|to kya ho gaya hai unakaafiron ko ki aapakee or daude chale aa rahe hain
70|37|daayen tatha baayen samoohon mein hokar.
70|38|kya unamen se pratyek vyakti lobh (laalach) rakhata hai ki use pravesh de diya jaayega sukh ke svargon mein
70|39|kadaapi aisa na hoga, hamane unakee utpatti us cheez se kee hai, jise ve[1] jaanate hain.
70|40|to main shapath leta hoon poorvon (sooryoday ke sthaanon) tatha pashchimon (sooryaast ke sthaanon) kee, vaastav mein ham avashy saamarthyavaan hain.
70|41|is baat par ki badal den unase uttam (utpatti) ko tatha ham vivash nahin hain.
70|42|atah, aap unhen jhagadate tatha khelate chhod den, yahaan tak ki ve mil jaayen apane us din se, jisaka unhen vachan diya ja raha hai.
70|43|jis din ve nikalenge qabron (aur samaadhiyon) se, daudate hue, jaise ve apanee moortiyon kee or daud rahe hon.
70|44|jhukee hongee unakee aankhen, chhaaya hoga unapar apamaan, yahee vah din hai jisaka vachan unhen diya ja[1] raha tha.
71|1|nihsandeh, hamane bheja nooh ko usakee jaati kee or ki saavadhaan kar apanee jaati ko, isase poorv ki aaye unake paas, doohkhadaayee yaatana.
71|2|usane kahaah he meree jaati! vaastav mein, main khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon, tumhen.
71|3|ki ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee tatha daro usase aur baat maano meree.

71|4|vah kshama kar dega tumahaare lie tumhaare paapon ko tatha avasar dega tumhen nirdhaarit samay[1] tak. vaastav mein, jab allaah ka nirdhaarit samay aa jaayega, to usamen der na hogee. kaash tum jaanate
71|5|nooh ne kahaah mere paalanahaar! mainne bulaaya apanee jaati ko (teree or) raat aur din.
71|6|to mere bulaave ne unake bhaagane hee ko adhik kiya.
71|7|aur mainne jab-jab unhen bulaaya, to unhonne de leen apanee ungaliyaan apane kaanon mein tatha odh lie apane kapade[1] tatha ade rah gaye aur bada ghamand kiya.
71|8|phir mainne unhen uchch svar mein bulaaya.
71|9|phir mainne unase khulakar kaha aur unase dheere-dheere (bhee) kaha.
71|10|mainne kahaah kshama maango apane paalanahaar se, vaastav mein vah bada kshamaasheel hai.
71|11|vah varsha karega aakaash se tumapar dhaaraapravaah varsha.
71|12|tatha adhik dega tumhen putr tatha dhan aur bana dega tumhaare lie baag tatha naharen.
71|13|kya ho gaya hai tumhen ki nahin darate ho allaah kee mahima se
71|14|jabaki usane paida kiya hai tumhen vibhinn prakaar[1] se.
71|15|kya tumane nahin dekha ki kaise paida kiye hain allaah ne saat aakaash, oopar-tale
71|16|aur banaaya hai chandrama ko unamen prakaash aur banaaya hai soory ko pradeep.
71|17|aur allaah hee ne ugaaya hai tumhen dharatee[1] se adbhut roop se.
71|18|phir vah vaapas le jaayega tumhen usamen aur nikaalega tumhen usase.
71|19|aur allaah ne banaaya hai tumhaare lie dharatee ko bistar.
71|20|taaki tum chalo usakee khulee raahon mein.
71|21|nooh ne nivedan kiyaah mere paalanahaar! unhonne meree avagya kee aur anusaran kiya usaka[1] jisake dhan aur santaan ne usakee kshati hee ko badhaaya.
71|22|aur unhonne badee chaal chalee.
71|23|aur unhonne kahaah tum kadaapi na chhodana apane poojyon ko aur kadaapi na chhodana vadd ko, na suva ko aur na yagoos ko aur na yaooq ko tatha na nasr[1] ko.
71|24|aur kupath (gumaraah) kar diya hai unhonne bahuton ko aur adhik kar de too bhee atyaachaariyon ke kupath[1] (kumaarg) ko.
71|25|ve apane paapon ke kaaran dubo diye gaye, phir pahuncha diye gaye narak mein aur nahin paaya unhonne apane lie allaah ke muqaabale mein koee sahaayak.
71|26|tatha kaha nooh neh mere paalanahaar! na chhod dharatee par kaafiron ka koee gharaana.
71|27|kyonki yadi too unhen chhodega, to ve kupath karenge tere bhakton ko aur nahin janm denge, parantu dushkarmee, bade kaafir ko.

71|28|mer paalanahaar! kshama kar de mujhe tatha mere maata-pita ko aur use, jo pravesh kare mere ghar mein eemaan laakar tatha eemaan vaalon aur eemaan vaaliyon ko tatha kaafiron ke vinaash hee ko adhik kar.
72|1|(he nabee!) kahoh meree or vahyee (prakaashna[1]) kee gayee hai ki dhyaan se suna jinnon ke ek samooh ne. phir kaha ki hamane suna hai ek vichitr quraan.
72|2|jo dikhaata hai seedhee raah, to ham eemaan laaye usapar aur ham kadaapi saajhee nahin banaayenge apane paalanahaar ke saath kisee ko.
